data.title: BANDtastic! Middle School Honor Band
data.meta_description: Drum, spin, and perform! Rockford Rhythm performs throughout the Rockford community.
data.text:
BANDtastic! is a program of Drum Corps International designed to celebrate the commitment to excellence made by middle school music programs all across the United States.

Participation in this program motivates middle school students to consider the arts as they make important skills development decisions for their high school years and beyond, and impact lifelong arts behaviors.

Students who participate in the BANDtastic! program will enjoy the following opportunities:

Experience a once-in-a-lifetime performance in front of thousands of spectators as a part of the national schedule of DCI Tour events

Take part in rehearsals and sectionals with professional artists and engaging educational clinicians

Take part in additional structured activities that promise to be packed full of engaging performances and speakers

Tickets to the corresponding DCI Tour event and the opportunity to observe performances from the “best-of-the-best” marching music ensembles

Exclusive BANDtastic! gear and “Swag” bags

More info about this program can be found at: dci.org/bandtastic

Who: For middle school band and color guard students (grades 6-8)

When: Saturday, July 5; 9:00 am – 8:00 pm

Where: Boylan Catholic High School, 4000 St Francis Dr, Rockford, IL 61103

What: A full day of music rehearsals and leadership clinics culminating in a performance in front of thousands of fans. Stay to watch the nation’s top drum corps compete at the Phantom Regiment Show of Shows.

Official Promotional Flyer

Registration for students includes a BANDtastic T-Shirt, DCI “swag bag”, lunch, dinner and ticket to the associated DCI event.

Nominations from directors due March 15

Registration opens on April 1

Early bird deadline is April 19 ($89)

All registration ends May 10 ($99)

Family & Friends Packages are also available and will include a supporter t-shirt and discounted ticket in the reserved BANDtastic seating block for the event. More information will be available at registration.

You can also fill out this paper application and email [email protected] to nominate your group.
